website_summaries.verdict: A versatile, durable, and comfortable vest with room for different items plus easy access to water. It's one of the more expensive options, but it has a lot to offer.
pros: Has a design that allows front access to dual hydration flasks
Owners rave about the lightweight, comfortable fit that some say really is like a second skin
Features ample pockets for other gear
Can hold up to about 1.5 liters of water
cons: Comes with flasks, but the bladder is a separate purchase
Individuals with broad chests may need to order up in size

customer_reviews.title: Scratchy mesh back and poor weight distribution
customer_reviews.text: I wanted to like this so badly. Lightweight, soft, stretchy, collapsible water bottles. I tried two different sizes. Small was fine until you filled water bottles and then the weight in the front just pulled down and stretched and bounced. So I figured I need smaller size. XS everything held together better, but was actually too tight through my shoulders and was causing chafing especially because (even though the entire vest is made from that stretchy soft amazing fabric) the actual back of it that is against your back is lined with scratchy black mesh. So the mesh was chafing the edges of my shoulders that my running tank didn’t cover. Amazon was amazing as always about accepting my returns.
customer_reviews.author: Boat in the Bay

customer_reviews.title: Just ran and trained for my first ultra with this and it was perfect. No bounce at all
customer_reviews.text: More pockets than you'll know what to do with. Just ran and trained for my first ultra with this and it was perfect. No bounce at all. I'm 5'8" 150 and was worried about the xsmall/small, but it's a solid fit and the elastic hooks in the front allow for adjustment. Arrange this pack right and you could be out on the trails all day without needing a break.

product_meta.title: Salomon Adv Skin 5 Set
product_meta.description: Any runner knows the importance of staying hydrated during race. With this Salomon® hydration pack, you can worry less about staying hydrated and focus on the finish line. This brand is a member of the Sustainable Apparel Coalition. Part of the S-Lab collection. Ideal for shorter races. Breathable and quick-drying materials help to manage moisture and odor. Sensifit conforms to the body for fit and stability. Soft trims help prevent uncomfortable rubbing and chafing. Front hydration for lightweight convenience. 4D Pole Holder allows quick and easy access to your poles during running. Bite-activated valve for high-flow hydration. Two 17 oz (500ml) flasks included. Reflective for safety. Safety whistle included. Safety blanket included. PVC, phthalate, bisphenol-A free. Dimensions:Width: 16 inHeight: 16 inDepth: 12"Weight: 13 oz Imported.
